description: Detect and list form fields in any PDF. Fill forms with your data and receive the completed PDF in seconds. Get a secure download link for easy sharing.

capabilities.name: detect_form_fields
capabilities.description: Detect and list all form fields in a PDF file. Accepts file path or URL.

capabilities.name: fill_form_fields
capabilities.description: Fill form fields in a PDF and upload to S3. Returns a pre-signed URL to download the filled PDF.
